review: I like it though some of the channels don't have audio.  Also, i had to unplug it when i kept getting knocked off the internet.  The modem wifi doesn't like it.  disconnecting it solved modem issues.  Another problem it has is when it goes to sleep, it doesn't wake up.  I have to go behind the tv and unplug the power to the device for a few seconds and plug it back in for it to work.
